You need to specify an address or place
You need to specify only one

There are three icons on the beetroute action bar. First icon: Directions. Click on this and you will be prompted for a destination. On entering destination information, three routes will be plotted in different colors. Currently the colors have no significance. Second icon: My trips - brings up an applicaiton that lists all your previous trips. Third icon: Find me - Send your location information to another beetroute user in your contacts list.Sends the location co-ordinates as an SMS. At the other end, upon receiving the SMS, the application plots 3 possible routes from your contacts location to your location.
